summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2Pcs Summer Crystal Sequins Unicorn Girl Alligator Hair Clips (Holo+Pome Purple)
Review Date: 2021/12/27
Store: Summer Crystal
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Summer Crystal', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Polyester, Cotton', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 2.75 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '635638430488'}
Review Text: There are two sparkling unicorn hair accessories with alligator clips included in this set. They are good quality and handmade. They are easy to stick into thin hair for any little girl to enjoy. I love the sparkle and the girlyness of these hair clips!
Review Title: Cute!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad
Review Date: 2022/01/08
Store: PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
Review Text: These oil removing and make up removing wipes work well! There are 60 pads in this container. It also comes with a plastic tweezers so you can remove one pad without touching all the rest of the pads with your fingers. The lid flips open for easy daily access.
Review Title: Moisturizing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gold Collagen Under Eye Patches Mask for dark circles and puffiness by Levitural - Golden Eye Bags Treatment - Mother's Day Gift for Women
Review Date: 2022/01/15
Store: LV Levitural
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LV Levitural', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Hydration', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 1.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '766234785310'}
Review Text: I love how sparkly these eye masks are! It’s soothing and helps to reduce wrinkles under your eyes. There’s a little spatula that comes with this so you don’t have to use your fingers to dig in the jar to get that I am ask. It’s good quality and I recommend it!
Review Title: Sparkly!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair
Review Date: 2022/03/14
Store: invisibobble
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'}
Review Text: The pictures on this product make it seem like you can use this bobby hair tie in a ponytail. This is not true. My hair is very thin and with any type of hair tie I have to tie it at least three times. I cannot make this hair clip wrap around and stay wrapped around my thin ponytail. I can do this at the end of a braid with less hair. It is cute but it is difficult to make it stay closed.
Review Title: Difficult to make this stay closed
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair
Review Date: 2022/03/14
Store: invisibobble
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'}
Review Text: The pictures on this product make it seem like you can use this bobby hair tie in a ponytail. This is not true. My hair is very thin and with any type of hair tie I have to tie it at least three times. I cannot make this hair clip wrap around and stay wrapped around my thin ponytail. I can do this at the end of a braid with less hair. It is cute but it is difficult to make it stay closed.
Review Title: Cannot stay closed around a ponytail
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AOA Studio Collection Makeup Sponge Set Makeup Blender Latex Free and High-definition Set of 5 Makeup Blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Blender Beauty Cosmetic Beveled
Review Date: 2022/04/24
Store: AOA STUDIO
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AOA STUDIO', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.39 x 1.97 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022931338'}
Review Text: These make up blenders are soft and great for applying foundation. They don’t absorb too much of the foundation and they help to apply it in an even way. Part of the proceeds go to help animals and need which is nice. They are also made in Texas. They are easy to clean and reuse.
Review Title: Great for applying foundation
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: WING Fly Grl Mane-Taming Gel Wand 8ml
Review Date: 2022/04/26
Store: Wing
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'Wing', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.27 x 0.74 x 0.74 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '810023041894'}
Review Text: I have tried hair flyaway gel before that comes with a mascara wand but this one comes with a wand that looks like it would go to a lipgloss. I feel like the wand itself makes it messier to apply because you are just rubbing it on your hair instead of brushing it to catch all the flyaways. The gel itself works well but you just have to apply a little more pressure with the wand to get it to go where you want to go.
Review Title: Good hold
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BABOR Power Serum Ampoule: Beta Glucan | Calms, Strengthens, Soothes | 2D Hyaluronic Acid & Microsilver | Clean & Vegan | Visible Results in 7 Days
Review Date: 2022/05/22
Store: Babor
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Instantly calms, strengthens & soothes complexion while providing intense hydration. Visible results in 7 days.Instantly calms, strengthens & soothes complexion while providing intense hydration. Visible results in 7 days.  See more', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Babor', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.39 x 0.91 x 5.83 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': '400699'}
Review Text: This serum helps to reduce redness and irritation on skin. This is a week long supply and you use one vial a day. It definitely helps to clean up your skin.
Review Title: Helps to reduce redness
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dry Weightless Hair Volume and Texture Spray | Dry Texture Spray for Hair | Texturizing Spray | Sulfate and Cruelty Free 244ml (7oz)
Review Date: 2022/07/09
Store: Osensia
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Fine', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '850001832274'}
Review Text: I have thin, fine hair. This texture spray helps to add volume to my hair. Spray at the roots on dry hair and massage in. The scent is nice and it does it’s job!
Review Title: Helps to add volume
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LSxia LX1101-3
Review Date: 2022/08/30
Store: LSxia
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LSxia', 'Finish Type': 'Glitter,Shimmer,Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Package Dimensions': '5.28 x 0.94 x 0.71 inches; 0.07 Ounces'}
Review Text: I really like this eye shadow color. It goes on smooth. If you don’t use an eye shadow primer, it may crease so keep that in mind for all day wear.
Review Title: Use with eye primer
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Elli K Essential Sincerity From AZ Time Reverse Double Ampoule – Made in USA - Double Layering Serum – Repairing & Deep Hydrating – Oil and Cream Formula for Healthy and Smooth Skin, (2.02 fl.oz.)
Review Date: 2022/09/22
Store: ELLI K
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Banana', 'Brand': 'ELLI K', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.93 x 1.73 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '841960174819'}
Review Text: This face lotion is packaged well. When you push the top it mixes two different types of products to create the ultimate moisturizing face lotion. It absorbs quickly into your skin and leaves your skin looking and feeling fresh.
Review Title: Comes and really nice packaging
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has shown a clear preference for products that offer quality and good design, as reflected in their enjoyment of unique accessories that add sparkle and charm. There is a consistent appreciation for items that effectively cleanse and hydrate the skin, as well as tools that assist in smooth makeup application. The helpfulness of included features, like tweezers for hygienic pad access or spatulas for easy application, has enhanced their satisfaction. They favor products that contribute positively to their beauty routines and emphasize the importance of positive experiences, such as effective skin care and appealing hair accessories.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has expressed frustration with certain products, particularly those that did not perform as expected for specific hair types. They noted difficulties in getting hair ties to stay closed, indicating a disconnect between product representation and functionality. Furthermore, challenges with application methods for hair gels suggest a need for improved design. Although some products delivered on quality, there are notable concerns about usability that detracted from the overall satisfaction with those particular items.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's shopping behavior reveals a mix of positive and negative experiences. They enjoy high-quality, effective beauty products that enhance their routines and often appreciate thoughtful design features, which lead to positive reviews. However, they have also encountered products that fell short of performance expectations, particularly in regard to usability for specific hair types. These negative experiences highlight the importance of clear product representations and functionality. Overall, while there are standout items in their purchase history, balancing effectiveness and usability remains pivotal.

target_interaction.title: Keeps makeup organized
target_interaction.text: The silicone brush covers come in different sizes for different types of brushes. You put it over the brush end without bristles and slide it up over the bristles. You can slide it down when you’re using the brush so you don’t have to take it off. There are also covers for applicators for lip gloss. They have a little suction cup on the bottom so you can keep it attached to the container so you don’t lose it. This keeps your lip gloss sanitary because you’re not constantly sticking your finger in the pot.
